Review Name: Just wow! Review Description: superb product from Voltas I m writing the review after 2 weeks from the installation. it chilled the room in 15 minutes @ turbo mode timer function not working. heat function is not available in this AC as the Flipkart mentioned in the description. Rest AC is working well . delivery was on time thanks Flipkart for the delivery on time. installation done by Voltas team very professional way. it was free of cost as inverter ac.
